channel.title: Article Reviews on Senan Adonis Kassem

item.title: BackMATH - Towards Backward Reasoning for Solving Math Problems Step by Step
item.description: A review of the BackMATH paper, covering its impact on training models for reasoning, key insights, and future directions.

item.title: FP8-LM - Training FP8 Large Language Models
item.description: FP8 mixed-precision allows for dramatically lower computational costs and memory overheads while maintaining predictive performance. A must read!
